comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: From a pamphlet about the history of Cootamundra: "At Salt Clay Creek (near The Gap) a train derailment occurred on 25 January [ 1885 ] following heavy rain. 6 people were killed and another died days later. 45 were injured." [ source - www.cootamundra.local-e.nsw.gov.au/files/1023/File/Histor... ] Looks like there's a pic at State Library NSW of the same incident being cleared: libapp.sl.nsw.gov.au/cgi-bin/spydus/ENQ/PM/FULL1?389127,I
